mapper.select: SELECT l.lecture_no, l.subject_no, l.classroom_no, l.user_id, u.user_name, s.subject_name, s.subject_grade FROM subject s inner JOIN lecture l ON s.subject_no = l.subject_no inner join user u on l.user_id = u.user_id

SELECT l.lecture_no, s.subject_name, s.subject_grade, i.sign_state, i.sign_no, m.major_name, t.user_id, t.st_name, t.st_grade FROM lecture l INNER JOIN subject s ON l.subject_no = s.subject_no INNER JOIN sign i ON l.lecture_no = i.lecture_no INNER JOIN student t ON i.user_id = t.user_id INNER JOIN major m ON t.major_no = m.major_no WHERE l.lecture_no = #{lectureNo}
SELECT s.subject_grade, s.subject_name, m.major_name FROM lecture l INNER JOIN subject s ON l.subject_no = s.subject_no INNER JOIN major m ON s.major_no = m.major_no
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sign_cancel( sign_no, user_id, cancel_date, lecture_no, cancel_id ) VALUES ( #{signNo}, #{userId}, NOW(), #{lectureNo}, #{cancelId} )
